ORIGIN_TYPES.title: Saiyan
ORIGIN_TYPES.description: A Race of space barbarians with the power to transform into Great Apes. Huge appetites.

ORIGIN_TYPES.title: Half Saiyan
ORIGIN_TYPES.description: The result of a human and a saiyan, boasting many of the same strengths as a saiyan but with interest in battle. Huge Appetites.

ORIGIN_TYPES.title: Earthling
ORIGIN_TYPES.description: Humans capable of harnessing Ki. Technology(item)

ORIGIN_TYPES.title: Namekian
ORIGIN_TYPES.description: Humanoids with plant and slug-like characteristics, including green skin and antennae. Can survive on only water. Regeneration

ARCHETYPE_TYPES.title: Warrior
ARCHETYPE_TYPES.description: The battle hungry archetype geared for high intensity combat.

ARCHETYPE_TYPES.title: Support
ARCHETYPE_TYPES.description: The comic relief archetype, helpful distractions and buff to the party.

ARCHETYPE_TYPES.title: Striker
ARCHETYPE_TYPES.description: An archetype capable of altering the battlefield and negating villains abilities.

ARCHETYPE_TYPES.title: Tank
ARCHETYPE_TYPES.description: The sturdiest archetype, capable of absorbing large amounts of damage, regenerating from it or saving others.

FORM_TYPES.title: Great Ape
FORM_TYPES.description: A Saiyan or Half Saiyan tranforms during a full moon or similar conditions, Becoming the great Ape. This power is saved for particularly difficult to conquer planets.

FORM_TYPES.title: Super Saiyan
FORM_TYPES.description: A Saiyan or Half Saiyan becomes a Super Saiyan. Their power is amplified many times over, their eyes become teal and their hair a spiky gold.

FORM_TYPES.title: Potential Unlocked
FORM_TYPES.description: Granted by an Elder Guru a characters latent ability is unlocked.
